solution_line_template: The cost of the four pizzas is {num_pizzas} x ${price_per_pizza} = $<<{num_pizzas}*{price_per_pizza}={cost_pizzas}>>{cost_pizzas}.
The total cost, including the tip, is ${cost_pizzas} + ${tip}= $<<{cost_pizzas}+{tip}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
Therefore, Gemma gets a change of ${bill_given} - ${total_cost} = $<<{bill_given}-{total_cost}={change}>>{change}.
